de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom
Class ScriptCommandDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.ScriptCommandDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ScriptCommandDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A dialog that represents one command of a script. It shows which parameters the command has and lets the user check if there parameters a formed correctly. After the user clicked on okay the command will be written back to both the CommandModel and the editor.

See Also:
Serialized Form
